Articles.Content: Built this ship... then everything halted. The ship parts I had removed from the ship could not be placed anywhere (couldn't drop them, unchoose them)... couldn't launch the ship or the client crashed. Next time I start the client, this happens when I load and try Launch button: http://steamcommunity.com/id/Valomaki/screenshot/543013867081110600

Looks like you managed to break it, it's a simple enough looking craft that you could rebuild it easily enough I think, but if you really want to try to save it you could try putting the file in the sub-assemblies folder and loading it from there
Apparently this also broke building new ships... can't move any parts around. http://steamcommunity.com/id/Valomaki/screenshot/543013867081318395
